content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 308.3 - Payment upon completion of required service

State Regulations
(a) Any employee in the professional service, other than a person who is eligible to accrue vacation leave pursuant to Title
A of Part 337 of this Chapter, shall, upon resignation or retirement, be paid
for salary or remuneration due by reason of the completion of required services
at the time of resignation or retirement, such payment to be computed in
accordance with the following formula: ((service performed/(service required) x annual salary) -
salary received =
salary due
where the service performed and service required are in
terms of quarters, trimesters, months, weeks, or other appropriate units
consistent with the obligation requirements at the campus concerned, and the
salary received is that amount actually paid to him for the period indicated in
the formula as service performed. (b) In case of death while in service, such
amount as may otherwise be payable for completion of required service shall be
paid to the deceased employee's estate or as provided in section
1310
of the Surrogate's Court Procedure
